Example 1:
$$
\left(\begin{array}{cc}
1 & 0 & 0\\
5.7 & 1 & 0\\
1.2 & 8.4 & 1
\end{array}\right)*
\left(\begin{array}{cc}
3.7 & 9.2 & 4.7\\
0 & 2.4 & 5.2\\
0 & 0 & 6.9
\end{array}\right)=
\left(\begin{array}{cc}
3.7 & 9.2 & 4.7\\
21.09 & 54.84 & 31.99\\
4.44 & 31.2 & 56.22
\end{array}\right)
$$
